refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Memcache::delete deletes item with the key. If parameter timeout is specified, the item will expire after timeout seconds.
Also you can use memcache_delete function. See example below.

example.title: Memcache::delete example
example.programlisting:
<?php

/* procedural API */
$memcache_obj = memcache_connect('memcache_host', 11211);

/* after 10 seconds item will be deleted by the server */
memcache_delete('key_to_delete', 10);

/* OO API */
$memcache_obj = new Memcache;
$memcache_obj->connect('memcache_host', 11211);

?>
